name: UPennMobileComponentsSDK
summary: SDK that contains common UI elements, utilities, functionality etc, for re-use across all University of Pennsylvania mobile applications.
description: SDK that contains common UI elements, utilities, functionality etc, for re-use across all University of Pennsylvania mobile applications. This SDK will make it much easier to implement core components for new applications, and get a better birds-eye-view of what version components a specific application is running, allowing for quick & easy updating.
